title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama hosted participants at the official launch of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs’ Legacy Projects

content.rendered:
he Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama hosted participants at the official launch of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs’ Legacy Projects, today, Thursday, 18th May, 2023.
The Legacy Projects consists of 3 independent ICT-driven initiatives namely: (i) The Nigerian Global Citizen Help Desk (ii) The Nigerian Global Business Match-Making Portal and (iii) The Diplomatic Service Digitization Initiative, which unified the websites of all Nigerian Missions with that of Headquarters in one secured space.
The initiatives are in furtherance of the 2019-2023 priority mandate given to Ministry by the President Muhammadu Buhari’s Administration.
The event was attended by the Governor of Edo state, H.E. Godwin Obaseki, the Chairman, Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, Sen. Bulkachuwa Adamu Muhammad, Hon. Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Director-General, National Intelligence Agency, Chairman/CEO of Nigerian in Diaspora Commission, Hon. Abike Dabiri-Erewa, among other dignitaries.
For more details on the initiatives visit:

http://www.ngbm.foreignaffairs.gov.ng

http://www.foreignaffairs.gov.n
